title: mouse over stack lets you see face down morph card.
content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on October 02, 2014 12:39:59_

when opponent plays a card face down with morph, you can see what he is playing with mouseover on the stack ( http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&t=3735&p=163682&sid=37dad643779c1ef87f3d284312c3c940#p163614 ).
